Um, Cameron Kweller
Interstellar
Stood up to the dick

Cameron, one

I do.

Hey.

Formal wear, or the closest thing I could find to it in your closet.

Why are there so many Skittles on the floor?
translation.ko: 바닥에 스키틀즈는 왜 떨어져 있는 거야?

translation.en: Because I spilled some Skittles. Look, if that's for prom, I--
Look, I know what you're gonna say, okay, and… I get it.
Padgett screwed up.
What she did was mean and selfish and wrong.
translation.ko: 못되고 이기적이고 옳지 않은 일을 했지

translation.en: Yes, exactly. So why are you here?
Because, Cam…
I've… I've missed you.
Brin, I'm right here.
No, no. I mean, like…
I miss the way you used to be, you know? Before…
Before Mom.
[sniffs] Ever since you've been with Padgett, okay,
you've been back, and you've been smiling again, and you've been happy.
translation.ko: 예전으로 돌아가고 다시 웃고, 행복해 보였어

translation.en: And I just feel like… [sniffs] …for the first time since we moved here
that I have my brother back.
And don't lose her, Cam.
We lost mom, and there's nothing we could have done about that,
translation.ko: 엄마를 잃었을 땐 우리가 할 수 있는 게 없었지만

translation.en: but now you have a choice, so just… just don't lose her, okay?
translation.ko: 지금은 기회가 있잖아 그러니까 놓치지 마, 응?

translation.en: There you are, thank God. We need you to start the dance.

translation.en: Nothing, I just noticed you didn't bring Cameron.

You win the bet.
And when are you gonna become a permanent loser?

translation.en: I'll get it done as soon as I can. Happy?

translation.ko: 캘리고 어스퀘이크 여러분 이제 올해의 댄스가 시작되니…

translation.en: -Come on. This is it. Let's go. -[Alden] Jordan, it's time.
Come on, guys. If you put your TikToks down,

translation.ko: 친구들이 현실에서 춤추는 걸 볼 수 있어요

translation.en: It's gonna be great.
[sighs, speaking to self] We have some weird-ass traditions at this school.
Hey, excuse me. Sorry. Hi.
We hired a DJ for this thing. They said he was over here somewhere.
translation.ko: 이 행사 때문에 고용한 DJ가 있어요, 여기 어딘가에 왔다던데

translation.en: -Oh actually, that's… that's me. -You're the DJ?
Great. Um, where's your stuff?
-My stuff? -Yeah, your equipment.
Your… your turntables,

translation.ko: 조그 휠, 크로스페이더 같은 거 트랙터 스크래치 하잖아요

translation.en: Dude, I have no idea what any of that stuff is.
Are you telling me we paid you $4,500 for your phone?
Yeah. Kinda. [scoffs]
You know that's more than I make in a month?
Well… I know that now.
Hey, so no sign of Cameron?
No, and if he doesn't get here soon, it's gonna be too late.
translation.ko: 안 보여, 빨리 안 오면 너무 늦어버릴 텐데

translation.en: It already is. Principal Bosch's about to announce the court.
translation.ko: 벌써 늦은 것 같아 교장이 곧 발표할 거야

translation.en: -You sure you still wanna do this? -Yes.

translation.ko: 내가 되면 네 폰으로 라이브 스트리밍 해줘, 그리고

translation.ko: 내 폰의 이 앱에 가서 빨간색 버튼 눌러

translation.en: -I mean, how can I do both? -Just give me the phone.
translation.ko: - 근데 내가 둘 다 어떻게 해? - 폰 이리 줘

translation.en: [Bosch tapping mic] Hello, hi, hey. One, two, three, eyes to me.

translation.en: Come on, bring it in. It's the big moment.
I know this is live streaming, but if you put your phones down,
translation.ko: 라이브 스트리밍 하는 건 알지만 폰을 내려놓으면

translation.en: it's actually happening right here in front of you.
translation.ko: 여러분 앞에서 실제로 일어나는 걸 볼 수 있어요

translation.en: Look, I know this means a lot to some of you, so let's get through it
translation.ko: 어떤 친구들에겐 큰 의미가 있는 일이죠? 그럼 이제 공개해서 끝내도록 하겠습니다

translation.en: so we can be done.
All right, your 2021 Cali High Prom King is
Jordan Van Draanen.
[Bosch] Congratulations to Jordan.
So humble, isn't he?
Just wanna slap his face. [chuckles]
I'm kidding. I would never slap a student, not until after they graduate.
translation.ko: 농담이에요, 졸업할 때까지는 학생 절대 안 때립니다

translation.en: But he's not going to graduate, so it's fine.
translation.ko: 저 친구는 졸업 못 할 테니 다행이겠네요

translation.en: Okay.
-Here you go, big guy. So proud. -[chuckles]
Enjoy your moment of glory.
[boy] Not my favorite.
It's Jordan Van Draanen, baby.
Is that it?
Yeah, bro.
Of course, it is.
No, I just want the microphone.
-Oh, okay. -Yeah. Okay, all right, yes!
Well, that was fun.
Moving right along. Your 2021 Prom Queen,

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Keep it on. Keep it all on.

translation.en: We have all seen plenty of your nipples.
All right, your 2021 Prom Queen,
in the closest vote we've had in a very long time,
Padgett Sawyer.
[girl] Yeah, Padgett!
Congratulations.
-Thank you! -Really beautiful.
[boy] That's right, Padge!
[Padgett] This is me.
And this is also me.
And this is me too.
-Hey. -[audience laughs]
But I'm gonna let you guys in on a little secret. It's all fake.
translation.ko: 하지만 여러분께 비밀을 하나 알려줄게요 저건 다 가짜예요

translation.en: Because the truth is, this is the real me.
translation.ko: 왜냐하면 사실 이게 진정한 제 모습이거든요

translation.en: [Padgett] And so is this.
Let's not forget about this one.
Bubble Girl!
Yep, that is snot coming out of my nose.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 저건 제 코에서 나오는 콧물이에요

translation.en: But here's the thing.
For the last four years,
I've been so busy selling myself on social media,
translation.ko: 저는 제 자신을 소셜미디어에 파느라 바빴어요

translation.en: putting out this image of who I wanted people to think I am,
translation.ko: 사람들이 나라고 믿어줬으면 하는 이미지를 만들어냈죠

translation.en: this perfect person
with perfect makeup,
perfect clothes,
perfect grades,
the perfect boyfriend.
And trust me.
Nothing could've been further from the truth.
I even lied about where I live.
We all do it…
in our own way
like someone special once told me.
He said high school is just a bunch of scared people
translation.ko: 이렇게 말했어요 '고등학교는 자신이 아닌 다른 뭔가인 척하는'

translation.en: pretending to be something they're not,
and that can be true.
Especially when we're at our worst.
But it doesn't have to be that way.
That's the lesson he taught me.
I only wish I didn't have to lose him to learn it.
translation.ko: 그걸 깨닫기 위해 그를 잃을 필요는 없으면 좋겠어요

translation.en: Are you sure?
Second place, coming through, make some room.
Second place, I'll take it. I mean, if she doesn't want it, I'll take it.
translation.ko: 2위니까 제가 받을게요 필요 없다고 하면 저 주세요

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Pierce, you… you actually came in fourth.
No, I demand a recount.
No need. You actually lost by a lot.
translation.ko: 그럴 거 없어요 큰 표 차로 졌으니까

translation.en: Please leave the stage.
-[boy 3] Burn! -Thank you. All right!
So the runner-up and your 2021 Prom Queen
is a write-in candidate.
Her name is Celeste Straczynski.
Is there a Celeste Straczynski here?
[softly] Your hat.
-[clears throat] -All right, let's do this.
-Ow! -Suck it!
DJ, hit it!
-[Quinn] Padgett. -All right.
I'm gonna take off.
Wait, your phone.
-Where are you going? -[Padgett] Home.
Come on, stay with us.
-I officially forgive you. -[Padgett chuckles]
No, I'm done here,
translation.ko: 아니, 여기선 할 거 다 했어

translation.en: but you guys have fun, though.
Well,
I'm still here, and why do I know this song?
translation.ko: 난 있을 거야 근데 이 노래를 왜 알지?

translation.en: -[text pings] -♪ Beside the green, green grass ♪
♪ Swing, swing ♪
♪ Swing the spinning step ♪
translation.ko: "장난해? 내 폰 골동품인 거 기억 안 나?"

translation.en: Hey.
Cameron. I… How…
I may have had a little help.
I would've rode him all the way, but I would've gotten arrested on the 405.
translation.ko: 줄곧 타고 올까 했는데 405번 도로에서 체포될 수 있어서…

translation.en: I meant what I said.
I'm gonna start being honest about who I am from now on,
I swear.
Okay, well, if we're being honest, there is one thing in your speech
translation.ko: 그래, 그래서 솔직히 말하자면 너 한 가지 틀렸더라

translation.en: you got wrong.
What was it?
You never really lost me.
Seriously?
-I'm done with her. -Thank you.
Now where were we?
[Brin] Yes! Whoo-hoo! Finally!
[boy] Check it out!
[Padgett] Good morning, guys.
Guess where we are?
Portugal! [chuckles]
Hard to believe we're already six days into our trip.
Say hi, Cameron.
I just wanna say thank you to all my followers who came back to me,
translation.ko: 돌아온 팔로워 여러분께 감사하단 말 하고 싶어요

translation.en: who are so supportive of my new direction here.
translation.ko: 저의 새로운 목표에 큰 지지를 보내주셨죠

translation.en: I hope you guys keep following us this summer because Cameron has promised
translation.ko: 이번 여름에 계속 저희와 함께해요 캐머런이 약속했거든요

translation.en: to help me post photos every day along the way.
So stay safe, be yourself,
and I'll see you guys soon.
♪ Lift your open hand ♪
♪ Strike up the band And make the fireflies dance ♪
♪ Silver moon's sparkling ♪
-All right, Alden. -[buzzing]
Never say I'm someone who welches on a bet.
translation.ko: 나더러 내기 벌칙 안 지키는 사람이라 하지 마

translation.en: ♪ So kiss me ♪
[Padgett laughs] Sorry.
-…sister again. -Hm.
Goddamnit, I flinched.
Get it!
Working. It's working great.
Well, I'm still here, and I'm gonna say that again.
translation.ko: 뭐, 난 있을 거야 그리고 다시 할 거야

translation.en: I mean, aren't you captain of the--
